data.text: @DukeandDuke_ Hi Billy, this is mainly related to individual countries requirements that documents should not be uploaded before a set time. When attempting to use the BA portal or VeriFly, it will reject upload if attempted too soon. The 3 to 5 days is general for most destinations.
